//ideal strings
#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;

short ideal(char c, string s){
    int idx, cnt=0;
    for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){
        if(s[i]==c){
            idx=i;
            break;
        }
    }
    for(int i=idx+1;i<s.length();i++){
        if(s[i]==c)cnt++;
    }
    if(idx==cnt)return true;
    return false;
}

int main(){
    int t;
    string s;
    bool idl;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        cin>>s;
        idl=true;
        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){
            if(!ideal(s[i],s)){idl=false;break;}
        }
        if(idl)cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
        else cout<<"No"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
